homeData.name: The Platform 2
homeData.desc: After a mysterious leader imposes his law in a brutal system of vertical cells, a new arrival battles against a dubious food distribution method.
homeData.starring: Milena Smit, Hovik Keuchkerian, Natalia Tena

homeData.name: Venom
homeData.desc: This is the final and most epic film about the couple Venom and Eddie Brock (Tom Hardy). After teleporting from the Marvel Universe in 'Spider-man: No way home' (2021) back to reality, Eddie Brock and Venom will now have to face the mighty evil god Knull - the creator of the entire Symbiote race and other lurking forces.
homeData.starring: Tom Hardy, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Juno Temple

homeData.name: Inception
homeData.desc: A skilled thief, Dom Cobb, who can enter people's dreams and steal their secrets from their subconscious, is offered a chance to have his past crimes forgiven if he can successfully perform an inception â€” planting an idea in someone's mind.

homeData.name: Interstellar
homeData.desc: With Earth's future looking bleak, a team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival, embarking on an epic journey beyond our galaxy.

trending.name: The Dinosaur
trending.desc: Sand and dust storms (SDS), also known as sirocco, haboob, yellow dust, white storms, and the harmattan, are a natural phenomenon linked with land and water management and climate change.

trending.name: The Great Emperor
trending.desc: The island, like its inhabitants, is wholly fictional. Kong's island home in the Pacific makes its first appearance, along with Kong himself, in the 1933 film King Kong.

trending.name: Jumbo Queen
trending.desc: Piracy is an act of robbery or criminal violence by ship or boat-borne attackers upon another ship or a coastal area, typically with the goal of stealing cargo and other valuable items or properties.
